Great new Japanese restaurant in Lund
Loads of choices, beautifully presented and delicious
Have been here twice in a short span and enjoyed both visits very much
Server is very nice, knowledgeable and even during the busiest times seems unflapable

I absolutely love this place and would recommend it to everyone! The sushi is fresh and soooo tasty! The tempura salad is to die for. Just wish the portions were bigger! I am not even going to bother having sushi from anywhere else!
Nice outdoor serving, warm even in the November rain. Staff was friendly enough, and the food was nice. Especially the sushi rolls with the crusty components were excellent.
Nice place with friendly service. Beautiful sushi with excellent taste. Perfect place for taking your friend to, even for dinner with your special someone. My favourite sushi restaurant!

We're pleased to have chosen to have our sushi in Lund her. The food was ample, well presented and tasty. The house white wine (Chile) was excellent.
